table.name: Bestiary
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE Bestiary (BestiaryId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT UNIQUE NOT NULL, Name VARCHAR (50), CR INTEGER, XP INTEGER, Race VARCHAR (50), Class VARCHAR (50), Alignment VARCHAR (50), Size VARCHAR (20), Type VARCHAR (100), SubType VARCHAR (100), Init INTEGER, Senses VARCHAR (200), Aura VARCHAR (150), AC VARCHAR (150), ACMods VARCHAR (150), HP INTEGER, HD VARCHAR (50), HPMods VARCHAR (100), Saves VARCHAR (150), Fort INTEGER, Ref INTEGER, Will INTEGER, SaveMods VARCHAR (100), DefensiveAbilities VARCHAR (100), DR VARCHAR (100), Immune VARCHAR (200), Resist VARCHAR (150), SR INTEGER, Weaknesses VARCHAR (100), Speed VARCHAR (100), SpeedMod VARCHAR (100), Melee VARCHAR (500), Ranged VARCHAR (250), Space VARCHAR (50), Reach VARCHAR (100), SpecialAttacks VARCHAR (500), SpellLikeAbilities VARCHAR (1500), SpellsKnown VARCHAR (1500), SpellsPrepared VARCHAR (3000), SpellDomains VARCHAR (50), AbilityScores VARCHAR (100), AbilityScoreMods VARCHAR (50), BaseAtk INTEGER, CMB INTEGER, CMD INTEGER, Feats VARCHAR (1000), Skills VARCHAR (1000), RacialMods VARCHAR (250), Languages VARCHAR (250), SQ VARCHAR (500), Environment VARCHAR (150), Organization VARCHAR (500), Treasure VARCHAR (1000), DescriptionVisual VARCHAR (1500), Grouping VARCHAR (50), IsTemplate BOOLEAN, SpecialAbilities VARCHAR (6000), Gender VARCHAR (25), Bloodline VARCHAR (25), ProhibitedSchools VARCHAR (50), BeforeCombat VARCHAR (25), DuringCombat VARCHAR (250), Morale VARCHAR (150), Gear VARCHAR (250), OtherGear VARCHAR (200), Vulnerability VARCHAR (25), Note VARCHAR (100), CharacterFlag BOOLEAN, CompanionFlag BOOLEAN, Fly BOOLEAN, Climb BOOLEAN, Burrow BOOLEAN, Swim BOOLEAN, Land BOOLEAN, TemplatesApplied VARCHAR (50), OffenseNote VARCHAR (100), BaseStatistics VARCHAR (500), ExtractsPrepared VARCHAR (250), AgeCategory VARCHAR (25), DontUseRacialHD BOOLEAN, VariantParent VARCHAR (25), Mystery VARCHAR (25), ClassArchetypes VARCHAR (25), Patron VARCHAR (25), CompanionFamiliarLink VARCHAR (25), FocusedSchool VARCHAR (25), Traits VARCHAR (25), AlternateNameForm VARCHAR (50), StatisticsNote VARCHAR (100), LinkText VARCHAR (50), UniqueMonster BOOLEAN, MR INTEGER, Mythic BOOLEAN, MT INTEGER)

table.name: BestiaryDetail
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE BestiaryDetail (BestiaryId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT REFERENCES Bestiary (BestiaryId) UNIQUE NOT NULL, MonsterSource VARCHAR (100), Source VARCHAR (50), Description VARCHAR (10000), FullText VARCHAR (25000))

table.name: Continents
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE Continents (ContinentId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT UNIQUE NOT NULL, Name VARCHAR (50), IsUnderground BOOLEAN, IsWater BOOLEAN, PrimaryLanguage VARCHAR (50))

table.name: Feats
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE Feats (FeatId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT UNIQUE NOT NULL, Name VARCHAR (50), Type VARCHAR (25), Description VARCHAR (500), Prerequisites VARCHAR (1000), PrerequisiteFeats VARCHAR (200), Benefit VARCHAR (5000), Normal VARCHAR (500), Special VARCHAR (750), Source VARCHAR (50), Fulltext VARCHAR (6000), Teamwork BOOLEAN, Critical BOOLEAN, Grit BOOLEAN, Style BOOLEAN, Performance BOOLEAN, Racial BOOLEAN, CompanionFamiliar BOOLEAN, RaceName VARCHAR (50), Note VARCHAR (500), Goal VARCHAR (1000), CompletionBenefit VARCHAR (1000), Multiples BOOLEAN, SuggestedTraits VARCHAR (100), PrerequisiteSkills VARCHAR (250), Panache BOOLEAN, Betrayal BOOLEAN, Targeting BOOLEAN, Esoteric BOOLEAN, Stare BOOLEAN, WeaponMastery BOOLEAN, ItemMastery BOOLEAN, ArmorMastery BOOLEAN, ShieldMastery BOOLEAN, BloodHex BOOLEAN)

table.name: MagicItems
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE MagicItems (MagicItemId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT UNIQUE NOT NULL, Name VARCHAR (100), Aura VARCHAR (100), CL INTEGER, Slot VARCHAR (50), Price VARCHAR (50), Weight VARCHAR (50), Description VARCHAR (10000), Requirements VARCHAR (500), Cost VARCHAR (150), Grouping VARCHAR (25), Source VARCHAR (50), AL VARCHAR (50), Int INTEGER, Wis INTEGER, Cha INTEGER, Ego INTEGER, Communication VARCHAR (50), Senses VARCHAR (100), Powers VARCHAR (250), MagicItems VARCHAR (250), FullText VARCHAR (10000), Destruction VARCHAR (1200), MinorArtifact BOOLEAN, MajorArtifact BOOLEAN, Abjuration BOOLEAN, Conjuration BOOLEAN, Divination BOOLEAN, Enchantment BOOLEAN, Evocation BOOLEAN, Necromancy BOOLEAN, Transmutation BOOLEAN, AuraStrength VARCHAR (25), WeightValue DOUBLE, PriceValue INTEGER, CostValue INTEGER, Languages VARCHAR (50), BaseItem VARCHAR (150), LinkText VARCHAR (50), Mythic BOOLEAN, LegendaryWeapon BOOLEAN, Illusion BOOLEAN, Universal BOOLEAN, Scaling VARCHAR (25))

table.name: MonsterSpawns
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE MonsterSpawns (SpawnId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT UNIQUE NOT NULL, Continent INTEGER REFERENCES Continents (ContinentId), Season INTEGER REFERENCES Seasons (SeasonId), BestiaryId INTEGER REFERENCES Bestiary (BestiaryId))

table.name: Months
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE Months (MonthId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT UNIQUE NOT NULL, Name VARCHAR (50), Season INTEGER REFERENCES Seasons (SeasonId), Days INTEGER)

table.name: NPCDetails
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE NPCDetails ( NPCID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT REFERENCES NPCs (NPCID) UNIQUE NOT NULL, MonsterSource VARCHAR (250), Description VARCHAR (2000), FullText VARCHAR (12000) )

table.name: NPCs
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE NPCs (NPCID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT UNIQUE NOT NULL, Name VARCHAR (100), CR INTEGER, XP INTEGER, Race VARCHAR (100), Class VARCHAR (100), Alignment VARCHAR (25), Size VARCHAR (25), Type VARCHAR (50), SubType VARCHAR (100), Init INTEGER, Senses VARCHAR (150), Aura VARCHAR (150), AC VARCHAR (50), ACMods VARCHAR (150), HP INTEGER, HD VARCHAR (100), HPMods VARCHAR (100), Saves VARCHAR (200), Fort INTEGER, Ref INTEGER, Will INTEGER, SaveMods VARCHAR (150), DefensiveAbilities VARCHAR (200), DR VARCHAR (100), Immune VARCHAR (250), Resist VARCHAR (100), SR VARCHAR (50), Weaknesses VARCHAR (100), Speed VARCHAR (100), SpeedMod VARCHAR (100), Melee VARCHAR (500), Ranged VARCHAR (250), Space VARCHAR (25), Reach VARCHAR (50), SpecialAttacks VARCHAR (500), SpellLikeAbilities VARCHAR (700), SpellsKnown VARCHAR (1500), SpellsPrepared VARCHAR (2000), SpellDomains VARCHAR (100), AbilityScores VARCHAR (100), AbilityScoreMods VARCHAR (25), BaseAtk INTEGER, CMB INTEGER, CMD INTEGER, Feats VARCHAR (1000), Skills VARCHAR (1000), RacialMods VARCHAR (200), Languages VARCHAR (500), SQ VARCHAR (500), Environment VARCHAR (25), Treasure VARCHAR (25), Organization VARCHAR (25), DescriptionVisual VARCHAR (150), Grouping VARCHAR (25), Source VARCHAR (50), IsTemplate BOOLEAN, SpecialAbilities VARCHAR (6000), Gender VARCHAR (25), Bloodline VARCHAR (50), ProhibitedSchools VARCHAR (50), BeforeCombat VARCHAR (1000), DuringCombat VARCHAR (2000), Morale VARCHAR (4000), Gear VARCHAR (1000), OtherGear VARCHAR (1000), Vulnerability VARCHAR (25), Note VARCHAR (250), CharacterFlag BOOLEAN, CompanionFlag BOOLEAN, Fly BOOLEAN, Climb BOOLEAN, Burrow BOOLEAN, Swim BOOLEAN, Land BOOLEAN, TemplatesApplied VARCHAR (50), OffenseNote VARCHAR (150), BaseStatistics VARCHAR (1000), ExtractsPrepared VARCHAR (500), AgeCategory VARCHAR (25), Mystery VARCHAR (100), ClassArchetypes VARCHAR (100), Patron VARCHAR (50), CompanionFamiliarLink VARCHAR (25), FocusedSchool VARCHAR (25), Traits VARCHAR (100), AlternateNameForm VARCHAR (50), LinkText VARCHAR (50), UniqueMonster BOOLEAN, ThassilonianSpecialization VARCHAR (50), Variant BOOLEAN, MR INTEGER, Mythic BOOLEAN, MT INTEGER, Spirit VARCHAR (25), PsychicMagic VARCHAR (25), KineticistWildTalents VARCHAR (500), Implements VARCHAR (1000), PsychicDiscipline VARCHAR (25))

table.name: Seasons
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE Seasons (SeasonId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT UNIQUE NOT NULL, Name VARCHAR (50))

table.name: SpellDetails
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE SpellDetails (SpellId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT REFERENCES Spells (SpellId) NOT NULL UNIQUE, Description VARCHAR (10000), DescriptionFormatted VARCHAR (12000), FullText VARCHAR (12000))

table.name: Spells
table.ddl: CREATE TABLE Spells (SpellId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT UNIQUE NOT NULL, Name VARCHAR (50), School VARCHAR (25), SubSchool VARCHAR (25), Descriptor VARCHAR (50), SpellLevel VARCHAR (200), CastingTime VARCHAR (50), Components VARCHAR (200), CostlyComponents BOOLEAN, Range VARCHAR (100), Area VARCHAR (100), Effect VARCHAR (200), Targets VARCHAR (200), Duration VARCHAR (100), Dismissable BOOLEAN, Shapeable BOOLEAN, SavingThrow VARCHAR (100), SpellResistance VARCHAR (50), Source VARCHAR (50), Verbal BOOLEAN, Somatic BOOLEAN, Material BOOLEAN, Focus BOOLEAN, DivineFocus BOOLEAN, Sor INTEGER, Wiz INTEGER, Cleric INTEGER, Druid INTEGER, Ranger INTEGER, Bard INTEGER, Paladin INTEGER, Alchemist INTEGER, Summoner INTEGER, Witch INTEGER, Inquisitor INTEGER, Oracle INTEGER, Antipaladin INTEGER, Magus INTEGER, Adept INTEGER, Deity VARCHAR (25), SLALevel INTEGER, Domain VARCHAR (100), ShortDescription VARCHAR (250), Acid BOOLEAN, Air BOOLEAN, Chaotic BOOLEAN, Cold BOOLEAN, Curse BOOLEAN, Darkness BOOLEAN, Death BOOLEAN, Disease BOOLEAN, Earth BOOLEAN, Electricity BOOLEAN, Emotion BOOLEAN, Evil BOOLEAN, Fear BOOLEAN, Fire BOOLEAN, Force BOOLEAN, Good BOOLEAN, LanguageDependent BOOLEAN, Lawful BOOLEAN, Light BOOLEAN, MindAffecting BOOLEAN, Pain BOOLEAN, Poison BOOLEAN, Shadow BOOLEAN, Sonic BOOLEAN, Water BOOLEAN, LinkText VARCHAR (50), MaterialCost INTEGER, Bloodline VARCHAR (150), Patron VARCHAR (100), MythicText VARCHAR (1000), Augmented VARCHAR (500), Mythic BOOLEAN, BloodRager INTEGER, Shaman INTEGER, Psychic INTEGER, Medium INTEGER, Mesmerist INTEGER, Occultist INTEGER, Spiritualist INTEGER, Skald INTEGER, Investigator INTEGER, Hunter INTEGER, HauntStatistics VARCHAR (250))
